attributes.action: Make the vote for mayor of London a NATIONAL vote.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that the British people should have a say in who represents our capital city on the world stage.
attributes.background:
I want the government to make the vote for mayor of London a national vote.
I believe that our capital city should have a mayor that everyone in the country has had a chance to elect with the backing of the entire population behind them when they take office.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715511
